Text.Page:
They're going to skin me alive if I go back without a good excuse, .

You know, cryptkeeper kulkaris have surrounded the Crypt of the Forsaken. If I said I was late because of them, and that you and I fought together to defeat them, no one would even bring up the "several days late" part.

And my story would be at least half-true, right?

Well, , you've spared me one of Galla's lectures about tardiness.

She can be very naggy sometimes.
It's gonna take more ears than that to impress Galla.
